plot: To payoff his second girlfriend's debt, hitman Melvin Smiley undertakes a kidnapping job with his usual associates. In a world of prospective Jewish in-laws and late movie fees, the hitman falls in love with the victim and must settle the score with those out to double-cross him.

m.role: Scary Black Man: Paris when actually pissed off and holding a golf club.

f.role: Asian Hooker Stereotype: Keiko's initial boyfriend is Caucasian. While attempting to rape her, the jerk quotes two phrases from Full Metal Jacket: "Me sucky-sucky" and "Me love you long time". By implication calling his "girlfriend" an Asian whore.

In The Big Hit, Keiko's initial boyfriend is Caucasian. While attempting to rape her, the jerk quotes two phrases from Full Metal Jacket: "Me sucky-sucky" and "Me love you long time". By implication calling his "girlfriend" an Asian whore.
Catholic School Girls Rule: Keiko spends the entire film in her college uniform, which fits the typical depiction of a catholic school girl uniform.

Distressed Damsel: Three unnamed teenaged girls, abducted by the white slavery ring. While Melvin takes out most people within the room, he makes sure that these three are unharmed, effectively rescuing them.

Jewish Mother, Jews Love to Argue, Jewish American Princess, You Have to Have Jews, All Jews Are Ashkenazi: Pam and her parents. Matzo Fever: Melvin, I guess, for being engaged to Pam. Maligned Mixedmarriage: Pam's mother towards Pam and Melvin's engagement.
Sassy Black Woman: Chantel exemplifies the most negative qualities of the trope. She is unnecessarily mean, sarcastic, and condescendingly cynical.

name: The Big Hit
